cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with error-correcting index coding, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and network information theory (cs.NI). It also involves the study of hypergraphs and bounds, which are related to discrete mathematics and theoretical computer science (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the decoding of linear ECIC's, which is related to coding theory (cs.CC). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of finding a shortest-length error-correcting code, which is related to optimization and algorithms (cs.SI).
